original_text: who went ahead of you on your journey, in fire by night and in a cloud by day, to search out places for you to camp and to show you the way you should go.
korean_text: 그는 너희보다 먼저 그 길을 가시며 장막 칠 곳을 찾으시고 밤에는 불로, 낮에는 구름으로 너희가 갈 길을 지시하신 자이시니라

sentences.original_text: who went ahead of you on your journey
in fire by night and in a cloud by day
to search out places for you to camp
and to show you the way you should go
